meanings.definition: A barbiturate used as an anticonvulsant.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed phenobarbitone to control the seizures.
meanings.sent2: She takes phenobarbitone daily to manage her epilepsy.
meanings.sent3: When the phenobarbitone kicked in, the seizures took a vacation!
meanings.sent4: Her brain felt like a calm lake after the phenobarbitone settled in.
meanings.sent5: The phenobarbitone shielded her from the storm of convulsions.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat seizures.
meanings.sent1: After taking phenobarbitone, the seizures decreased in frequency.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on phenobarbitone for emergency cases.
meanings.sent3: The seizures ran away when the phenobarbitone arrived on the scene!
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the phenobarbitone like a long-lost friend.
meanings.sent5: The phenobarbitone was a knight protecting her from the seizure dragon.

meanings.definition: A drug that acts on the central nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Phenobarbitone affects the brain to reduce seizure activity.
meanings.sent2: Doctors monitor the dosage of phenobarbitone closely for effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The central nervous system threw a party when the phenobarbitone arrived!
meanings.sent4: Her mind danced to a different tune under the influence of phenobarbitone.
meanings.sent5: The phenobarbitone whispered calming words to her nervous system.
